advanceKeeperGaugeEpoch(address).notice: Advance the keeper gauge for a pool by an epoch.

params.pool: Pool for which the keeper gauge is advanced.

batchUpdateAmmTokenWeights(address[],uin.details: Each entry in the tokens array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchUpdateAmmTokenWeights(address[],uin.notice: Update a batch of AMM token weights.

params.tokens_: AMM tokens to update the inflation weight for.
params.weights_: New weights for the inflation for the AMM tokens.

batchUpdateKeeperPoolWeights(address[],u.details: Each entry in the pools array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchUpdateKeeperPoolWeights(address[],u.notice: Update of a batch of keeperGauge weights.

params.pools: Pools to update the keeper weight for.
params.weights: New weights for the keeper inflation for the pools.

batchUpdateLpPoolWeights(address[],uint2.details: Each entry in the lpTokens array corresponds to an entry in the weights array.
batchUpdateLpPoolWeights(address[],uint2.notice: Update a batch of LP token weights.

params.lpTokens_: LpTokens to update the inflation weight for.
params.weights_: New weights for the inflation for the LpTokens.

checkpointAllGauges(uint256).details: This is mostly used upon inflation rate updates.

params.updateEndTime: is the time until which to update the gauges.

deactivateWeightBasedKeeperDistribution(.details: This can only be done once, when the keeper inflation mechanism is altered.
deactivateWeightBasedKeeperDistribution(.notice: Deactivates the weight-based distribution of keeper inflation.

setAmmGauge(address,address).notice: Sets the AmmGauge for a particular AMM token.

setKeeperGauge(address,address).details: Multiple pools can have the same KeeperGauge.
setKeeperGauge(address,address).notice: Sets the KeeperGauge for a pool.

params.pool: Address of pool to set the KeeperGauge for.

updateAmmTokenWeight(address,uint256).notice: Update inflation weight for an AMM token.

params.token_: AMM token to update the weight for.

params.pool_: Pool to update the keeper weight for.
params.weight_: New weight for the keeper inflation for the pool.

params.lpToken_: LP token to update the weight for.
